description: Check brake system for wear and ensure proper pad thickness. Inspect wheel bearings and verify axle alignment.
Examine coupler mechanism for damage or excessive wear. Test automatic coupler release functionality.
Inspect undercarriage for structural integrity. Check for cracks in frame or compromised support beams.
Review air brake system pressure and verify all connections are secure. Test emergency brake activation.
Examine door mechanisms and seals for proper operation. Check for damage to door tracks or rollers.
Perform routine lubrication of all moving parts. Check fluid levels and replace filters as needed.
Inspect electrical connections and verify lighting systems are functioning correctly. Test horn and safety equipment.
Standard visual inspection of exterior surfaces. Check for minor dents or scratches that may need attention.
